title: Detox in a Box - Herbal - Collaborative Natural Health Partners
description: Detox-in-a-Box Herbal by Apple A Day is a great addition to many detox plans.* This 2-in-1 product provides liver and gastrointestinal support through 2 herbal preparations.* Tinctures include a Bitters tonic and a Liver Support tonic. These liquids can be added to a small amount of water when taking. *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent disease.
